data.title: PBS announce 2019 Radio Festival
data.meta_description: With this year’s membership drive bearing the theme Work Your Magic, PBS are on the hunt for new subscribers to wave their hands and help contribute to the longevity of the community radio station, enshrining the station’s longstanding emphasis on independent music and its community-first ethos.   Running from Monday May 13 to Sunday May 26, the […]
data.text:
With this year’s membership drive bearing the theme Work Your Magic, PBS are on the hunt for new subscribers to wave their hands and help contribute to the longevity of the community radio station, enshrining the station’s longstanding emphasis on independent music and its community-first ethos.

Running from Monday May 13 to Sunday May 26, the PBS Radio Festival for 2019 offers potential first time subscribers and longtime supporters to chip in for the potential to win a bunch of prizes, including a Primavera 125 i-GET Vespa (painted red, of course), a luxury Golden Plains ticket package, a handmade electric guitar from Clignan Tone, a Gett by Funk turntable, a prize pack of PBS feature albums and exclusive prizes for performers, businesses, pets and junior members.

All new and renewing members will also receive an exclusive Sounds of Studio 5 live recording featuring performances from REMI., Mojo Juju and The Teskey Brothers. If you’re a dedicated supporter of all kinds of independent music in Melbourne, you’d be bonkers to sleep on this one.
